alert.note: Alert for Ballard (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 10 at 12:37PM EST until March 13 at 5:30PM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Missouri...Kentucky...Illinois... Ohio River at Olmsted Lock and Dam and at Cairo .Minor flooding continues along the Ohio River at Olmsted Lock and Dam and at Cairo. Water levels are expected to begin a slow fall, falling below flood stage at both locations early next week. For the Ohio River...including Olmsted Lock and Dam and Cairo... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MONDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River at Olmsted Lock and Dam. * WHEN...Until Monday afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM CST Friday the stage was 39.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late Monday morning and continue falling to 25.6 feet Monday, March 20. - Flood stage is 36.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
